name: Euro Freelancers
goal:
Euro Freelancers is a collaborative network of independent EU affairs and funding consultants and investors specialised in the collaborative economy and crowdsourcing solutions.

We provide direct access to a pool of experienced and highly skilled consulting resources to fill gaps across project teams, in critical roles and senior level positions.

Our mission is to support the growth and increase organisations' influence with the main European stakeholders and decision makers.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise
euInitiatives:
Entrepreneurship 2020 Action Plan
EU Single Market Strategy
EU Skills Agenda
Energy Services Directive
EU-Russia Partnership for Modernisation
EU Agenda on the Collaborative Economy
Crowdfunding Communication
European Pillar of Social Rights
EU Services Package
customers: European Forum of Independent Professionals,European Forum of Independent Professionals
